title: Critical Information Management Competency Development Program in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and information retrieval skills
context.additional_context: Students must critically analyze information from diverse sources and learn responsible content creation methods in digital environments. The goal is to apply information management skills in contexts similar to Peru’s 2022–2023 sociopolitical crisis.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a systematic analytical framework to evaluate the credibility of diverse media sources
Learners can design and implement ethical information production and sharing strategies in digital spaces
Learners can identify information bias and propose alternatives through fact-checking procedures in socially controversial contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
